InfluenceRule.name: hothead more likely to brag
arrogant more likely to brag
smooth talker more likely to brag
shallow more likely to brag
dumb people more likely to brag
brainy people more likely to brag
confident people more likely to brag
impulsive people more likely to brag
honest people less likely to brag
pacifist people less likely to brag
humble people less likely to brag
inarticulate people less likely to brag
people who have a lot of things more likely to brag
people who have done taboo things more likely to brag
people who have done bad ass things more likely to brag
people who have done gross things more likely to brag
Like to brag about dating
honest people less trustful of brags they can't see
arrogant people less trustful of brags they can't see
inarticulate people less trustful of brags they can't see
smooth talkers less trustful of brags they can't see
insecure people naturally comfortable with bragging
impulsive people naturally comfortable with bragging
less likely to trust brags from bad reputation
more likely to trust brags from good reputation
less likely to trust brags from someone you're annoyed with
less likely to trust brags from someone you're angry at
more likely to trust brags from someone on the honor roll
more likely to trust brags from someone excited
more likely to trust brags from someone popular
more likely to believe brags from someone who's done cool things before
more likely to believe brags from someone who's done bad-ass things before
less likely to believe brags from someone who's done lame things before
more likely to believe brags from someone who has something you want
more likely to believe brags from someone you already think is cool
less likely to believe brags from someone you don't think is cool
less likely to believe brags from someone you don't like
A brag is somewhat less likely to be accepted.

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %list(i,r,and)% traded grade-based insults
%i% bored %r% by talking about lockers
%i% bragged to %r% about school stuff
%i% told %r% about some cool stuff %pron(i,he/she)% did
%i% tried to make some lame thing sound cool to %r%
%i% surprised %r% with that cool story
%i% told %r% that badass story
%i% bragged to %r% about being like a prodigy or whatever
%i% expected %r% to believe %pron(i,his/her)% ridiculous BS
%r% confronted %i% about %pron(i,his/her)% compulsive exaggeration problems
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% too clueless to realize %is% %pron(i,was/were)% trying to brag
%i% had to convince %r% that %prons(i,he/she)% did something cool
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% too smart to fall for %ip% ridiculous bragging
%i% tried to brag about %pron(i,his/her)% coolness but it seriously backfired
%i% sort of walked all over %r% while bragging about stuff
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% too annoyed with %i% to listen to %pron(i,him/her)% brag
%i% bragged to %r% about being romantic with someone else, which was probably a bad idea
%i% grossed %r% out with all that bragging
%r% dated %i% for the sweet sweet biology answers
%i% bragged about %pron(i,his/her)% trip to the Mariano store
%i% bragged about how %prons(i,he/she)% stole a top from the Mariano Store
%i% told %r% about %pron(i,his/her)% close encounter with the cashier from Mariano
%i% bragged about hitting on %rp% %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend, %o%
%i% tried to brag to %pron(i,his/her)% enemy's %gender(r,b,g)%f about how superior %prons(i,he/she)% %pron(i,was/were)%
%i% bragged to %r% about being superior to %pron(r,his/her)% %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend
%i% schemed to steal %rp% %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend
%i% got all smug about stealing %o% from %r%
%r% never got over %ip% mean actions
%i% tried to brag to %r% but %pron(i,was/were)% overwhelmed with burning hatred instead
%i% bragged to %r% about dating %o%
%i% bragged to %r% about dating %o%
%i% tried bragging to %r% about dating %o% but it sorta backfired
%i% unwisely tried bragging to %r% about dating the %gender(o,boy,girl)% of %pron(r,his/her)% dreams
%i% tried to brag to %r% and it went over about like you'd expect
%i% bragged about cheating on %o%
%r% lost respect for %i% after %prons(i,he/she)% bragged about being a cheater
%r% put up with %ip% bragging
%i% acted like a fool trying to brag to %r%
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% super into %ip% story
%i% expected %r% to be impressed by some cool stuff %prons(i,he/she)% did
%i% bragged to %r% about being romantic with someone else, and %prons(r,he/she)% was cool with it

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, check it out. I got an A minus on my Bio final!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah? Well right now I'm getting a D minus in giving a damn.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're getting an F in Shut the Hell Up.

Hey %r%... man, %random(you wouldn't believe what an easy schedule I've got. I only have like one real class and everything else is just skating.,did you hear I got all those fines waived? Total amnesty.,I finally got that stupid requirement signed off that was holding me up from graduating.,I totally got that C in Pottery expunged from my permanent record.,I totally scored a free cap and gown for graduation.,I have a whole pack of hall passes now I can use at my leisure.)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Wow,Cool,Neat)%, %random(how'd you swing that,how'd you manage that,how'd you make that happen)%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(I have ways.,I know the right people.,Just working the system.,Pulled in some favors from the office ladies.)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Cool,Sweet,Rock on)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, have you been by my locker? It's in a totally primo location, %random(right by the cafeteria,right by the back entrance,right in the main hall,right by class)%. I have it decorated with all this stuff from...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Wow, this is really boring. I have to go.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ....uh, okay... bye!
How's it going %r%? Hey, did I ever tell you about that time when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's awesome %buddy%. Totally cool.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: How's it going %r%? Hey, did I ever tell you about that time when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh, that's pretty lame, %i%. Why would you even repeat that to any one?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh, well, I thought, uh....
How's it going %r%? Hey, did I ever tell you about that time when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Really? Wow... I wouldn't have pegged you for that kind of %gender(i,guy,girl)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, what's happening? Hey, did you hear about that time when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's badass, %gender(i,dude,girl)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, what's happening? Hey, did you hear about that time when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Wow, %i%, that's so amazing! You are such a cool %gender(i,guy,girl)%! I'm so lucky to know such a %positiveadj% person!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Gee, thanks.
Hey, %r%, did you ever hear about that time when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: God, %i%, what a cool story. You're such an amazingly %positiveadj% %pejorative%. I'm going to forward that right now to everyone I want to hate me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Go %random(eat a monkey,eat a flagpole,hug a toaster,suck an oil slick)%, %pejorative%.
Hey %r%, what's up? Hey so did I ever tell you about how I %random(learned to play the piano,wrote that whole novel,became a totally awesome skateboarder,learned to oil paint)% practically overnight?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Mmm, yeah, %random(that sounds familiar.,didn't I read about that in the paper or something?,I think I heard about that on the internet.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, apparently I'm like a natural prodigy or something.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Rock on.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, what's up? Hey so did I ever tell you about how I %random(learned to play the piano,wrote that whole novel,became a totally awesome skateboarder,learned to oil paint)% practically overnight?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah. I think on the same day you told me about %random(how you went to Russia over the weekend and had three hot dates,how you got a PhD over the summer,winning the medal of honor,replacing Philip Glass at that concert in New York)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That really happened, %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(As if.,Not.,You're such a liar.,You're pathetic.,Whatever.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %buddy%! Hey, did I ever tell you about that %random(time when I defeated a king cobra in single combat,time when I seduced that sexy guidance counsellor,time when I got sent on that spy mission by the Fed,birthday party where my parents flew all my friends to a private island)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%, look. We need to talk about this... exaggeration habit of yours.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What are you talking about?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I know you're just trying to come off as cool. But look, %buddy%. You're pretty cool already. Just talk about the real you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're right, %r%. I guess you know me better than anyone. You're a good friend.
%greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, hey %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Did you know that I %random(wrote a paper I had due for one of my classes in like 10 minutes,aced the last quiz I took without even studying,totally got out of having to take any required classes this year)%?
Yeah. Don't you think that's pretty cool?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Is it? Oh maybe. I don't really know. I don't think so, actually.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well you wouldn't know what cool is unless it hit you in the face.
Hey %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, hey %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Did you know that I %random(wrote a paper I had due for one of my classes in like 10 minutes, aced the last quiz I took without even studying, walked off school grounds during class,totally got a whole new wardrobe for free after I pretended to slip and fall at the Mariano store)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh yeah? Is that the kind of thing people think is 'cool' now or something?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's why I'm telling you. It's cool that I did that.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ooooooh, okay. Yeah, that *is* pretty 'cool' then.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm glad we could establish that.
%greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just thought you should know that I can %random(do a triple backflip blindfolded while snowboarding,hold my breath for ten minutes,climb Mount Everest in a day)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That sounds *so* unreasonable. There's no way I'm believing something as patently false as that.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well at least it sounded cool right?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't have time for this. Just go.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're in a good mood. What's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm on this new honesty kick. It's so refreshing to break down these social barriers and find out what people really think about you. So be honest, %r%: you think I'm cool, right?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Honestly? Uh, no, not at all.
%i% wants people to be honest with %pron(i,him/her)% about whether %pron(i,he/she)%'s cool or not.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: I'm going to go tell everyone about this. Stay 'cool,' %i%!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I can see honesty is not all it's cracked up to be.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, that seemed like a bad idea. Anyway, I'm gonna go see what %o% is laughing about over there, later.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... How would you like to hear about how great I am?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Um, well I guess-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So a few days ago I %random(totally went to the mall and got the coolest outfit in the world,snuck into the theaters and watched the coolest movie)%.
Cool! right?
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I think that is-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're a good listener, %r%. But you shouldn't talk so much.
See you later!
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Um, that would be-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What do you want %i%? I'm pretty annoyed with you right now.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, well I did something cool earlier, and I wanted to tell you about it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Why would I want to hear any of that?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uhh... well I just thought...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Nope. Lost cause.
%random(Get lost,Take a hike,Stop bothering me)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%, what's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just thought I would sweep you off your feet with a stunning tale of romantic and cool deeds.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ooooh, do tell!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You *what*?!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uhhh, I thought maybe you'd be cool with it?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Get out.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %greeting% %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Did I tell you about that time when %toc1%? Totally cool right?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Gross dude!,Ew!)%
Why would you tell me that and think it's cool?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... it sounded cool in my head....

Instantiation.name: Brag - (SS1 Act-1) All the Wrong Reasons Brag

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%. Hey, are you ready for the big bio final?
Because I was BORN ready, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: First, if you ever call me that again, I will kill you with a rusty screwdriver.
Second, that class is stupid and I hate it. How is studying the mating habits of monkeys supposed to affect our real lives anyway?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I asked my mom that and she said 'You'd be surprised.'

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Anyway, I'm probably going to flunk the final.
You wouldn't let a pretty %gender(r,boy,girl)% sit next to you during the test and take a glance at your answers every now and then, would you?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ...not for nothing, anyway.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Your terms?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Go out with me. Be my date to the prom.
All RIGHT! See you later, %sweetie%!
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ...all right, %i%. I'll do it. Just as long as you don't call me....

Instantiation.name: Brag - (SS6 Act-1) Brag about going to the Mariano Store.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%, what's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So I went to the Easthouse Mall a few days ago.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What were you doing there?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I was just shopping at that new Mariano store.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No way! That place is so cool.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, I know. It was a bit pricy, but I definitely felt cooler just being there.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What a %positiveadj% %gender(i,dude,chick)%.

Instantiation.name: Brag - (SS6 Act-2) Monica brags that she stole a top from Mariano.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%. Do I look different?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ummm, I don't know?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I totally stole a new top from the Mariano store at Easthouse a few days ago. I feel so *alive*!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No way!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, I really wanted it so I took the top and walked out as quick as I could.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %buddy%, when I grow up, I want to be just like you!

Instantiation.name: Brag - (SS6 Act-3) Monica explains the close call with stealing the shirt from Mariano.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %greeting% %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I had such a close call at the Mariano store at the Easthouse Mall a few days ago.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What happened?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: As I was walking out with this top that I didn't pay for, the cashier went running out after me!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Did he bust you?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Nah, he was actually giving me back my phone. I guess I left it in the store.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: So you got away with the top?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yep, pretty %positiveadj% huh?

Instantiation.name: Brag - (SS7 Act-2)Person from before brags with his friend about hitting on friend's girlfriend/boyfriend.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%. I totally hit on %o% earlier.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What do you mean you hit on %o%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %toc1%. It was great.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What the heck! That's my %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, well %pron(o,he/she)% really enjoyed it. Maybe %pron(o,he/she)% doesn't like you that much.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Whatever %pejorative%. I'm through talking to you.

Instantiation.name: Brag - Initiator bragging to his enemy's boyfriend/girlfriend FAIL

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh hey %r%. So, I just thought you should know that I totally own your %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)% in like... everything.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Am I suppose to be impressed by this?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, you know it's true. %o% may be too stupid to realize it, but %pron(o,he/she)%'s lucky you've stayed with %pron(o,him/her)% this long.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Just get out of my face, %i%.

Instantiation.name: Brag - Initiator bragging to his enemy's boyfriend/girlfriend succeeded

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%, what's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Just wondering if you realize I totally own your %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)% in like... everything.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %o% *can* be pretty uncool at times...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: If you ever happen to find yourself single... you know where my locker is.

Instantiation.name: Brag - You don't deserve your boyfriend Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hello, *%r%*.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What do *you* want?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I can't help but notice that %o% is still inexplicably dating you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What does that have to do with you?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You'll find out soon enough, %r%. Soon %o% will see what an eligible %gender(i,bachelor,bachelorette)% I am, and dump you like a bag of rotting lawn clippings.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Your delusions are as pathetic as they are insulting, %pejorative%. I'd laugh if I wasn't so totally bored.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: We'll see who's laughing soon, %r%. We'll see.

Instantiation.name: Brag - Homewrecked bragging to homewrecked reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, hey %r%. I just wanted to let you know that you can stop bothering %o% now with your texts and flowers and whatever. %gender(o,He,She)%'s way more into me, so you can stop troubling yourself.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, is that so, %i%? I'll have you know that %o% and I have something meaningful and precious that a homewrecker like you can never touch.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: We shall see, my dear. Let the best %gender(i,boy,girl)%friend win.

Instantiation.name: Brag - Showoff is rejected for secretly being a poopy-head

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%.
I totally aced that final I was worried about. Cool, huh?
I know right?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No, I mean 'wow' as in 'wow, that's so lame.' Almost as lame as when %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Are you still hung up on that? Move on, %gender(r,bro,girl)%.

Instantiation.name: Brag - r never appreciates i but i convinces r to accept anyway!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You know, %r%, I'm actually super cool. And interesting. I'm really interesting too. That's why people call me '%i% the super cool interesting %gender(i,dude,girl)%.'

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't actually think I've ever heard anyone call you that.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, typical. First %toc1% and now this. Why do you have to be so mean?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Get over yourself, %i%.

Instantiation.name: Brag to a friend - dating someone friend likes

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %buddy%... omg, so have you heard I'm dating %o% now??

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No way, really? You're so lucky... %gender(o,He,She)%'s totally %if(0,cool)elseif(1,popular)elseif(2,like a genius)else(right for you)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I know. It's so great. I really feel like I deserve someone like %gender(o,him,her)%, you know?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Awe, I'm happy for you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, hello %r%. Look, I don't mean to brag, but have you heard that %o% and I are dating now?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah totally! That must be nice. %gender(o,He,She)%'s a pretty %if(0,cool)elseif(1,popular)elseif(2,smart)else(okay)% %gender(o,guy,girl)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I know! I feel like I'm at a time in my life where I really deserve someone like %gender(o,him,her)%, you know?
Anyway, thanks for listening, %r%. I need to go text my %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, later! I'l just... be here.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, hello %r%. Look, I don't mean to brag, but have you heard that %o% and I are dating now?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh, yeah, I suppose. Is that supposed to be impressive or something?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Why wouldn't it be?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, I don't know. It's just, I've always thought %gender(o,he,she)% was sort of a %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Excuse me?!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, probably shouldn't have said anything. I'm gonna go now.

Instantiation.name: Brag to a friend - dating someone friend is into

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %buddy%... %random(omg,wow,so)%, have you heard I'm dating %o%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I heard.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well aren't you happy for me? I'm super happy. %gender(o,He,She)%'s so sweet and amazing and perfect for me that...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Look %i%, I don't want to hear any more from you about %o%. *I'm* the one who loves %o%, it should be *me* dating %gender(o,him,her)%!
You're always doing this! Always stealing the best %gender(o,boys,girls)% out from under me. Why don't you and %o% go get a room and stop grossing everyone out with your disgusting PDA all the time.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I can see *someone* woke up on the wrong side of the bed today.
Oh, hello, *%r%*.
I just wondered if you were aware how much of a better person I am than you.

Specifically, I'm talking about the %random(sick bunny I nursed back to health last night,awesome limo I scored as a Prom ride,good works and charitable deeds that are a daily part of my life here in town,years I've service I've given to this student body as active members of several major organizations)%, but I think it's true in general, too. Don't you?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ...You have *got* to be kidding me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... you want to hear some hot gossip?
I'm totally cheating on %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No way %buddy%. Seriously? That's crazy. With who?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Let's just say it's someone most %gender(i,guys,girls)% in this school wouldn't appreciate... but I totally do.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Isn't %o% going to be pissed at you? Or your new fling?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's nothing I can't handle.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't know how you do it, %gender(i,man,girl)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... you want to hear some hot gossip?
I'm totally cheating on %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What? That's terrible. With who?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Let's just say it's someone most %gender(i,guys,girls)% in this school wouldn't appreciate... but I totally do.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What does %o% think about this? Have you told %gender(o,him,her)%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's nothing I can't handle.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're a pretty terrible person, you know that %i%?
And to think, I used to think you were cool.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(Oh hey,Hey,What's up,Hi)% %r%. So, %random(I don't mean to brag but,I don't mean to brag but,get this:,I just realized)% I %random(probably will have a longer lifespan than anyone else in our class,have the best taste in music out of anyone in our class,am the best-dressed person in school,have now thrown up in every single toilet in this school,have now tried all thirty-two brands of Cheezeytoos ever manufactured,have an extraordinarily beautiful singing voice,have probably learned everything I'll ever need to know at this point)%. Cool eh?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %shocked%, %i%, %random(that's pretty crazy,no way,that's wild,get out of town,way cool,that's pretty cool)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(I know,Word,Totally,Yup yup,I'm glad you agree,Ain't no thang)%.

%random(Oh hey,Hey,What's up,Hi)% %r%. So, %random(I don't mean to brag but,I don't mean to brag but get this:,I just realized)% I %random(am probably better dressed than any other person at this school,am probably just basically a better person than anyone else I know,deserve success more than pretty much anyone else in school,should have won that award in junior high instead of you,have the best hair out of anyone in school,am destined for greatness whereas most students in this school will probably spend the rest of their lives as wage slaves)%.
No offense.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Get over yourself,You're pathetic,That's just sad,Nobody cares,Hope that works out for you)%, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%, what's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just thought I would sweep you off your feet with a stunning tale of romantic and cool deeds.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Ooooh, do tell!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's pretty hot.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You aren't mad?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Nope. Thanks for sharing, %sweetie%.
